product_overview: K-Tetris Seoul is a web-based Tetris game built with React and Next.js, providing an engaging and classic puzzle gaming experience. The game features smooth gameplay, intuitive keyboard controls, responsive canvas rendering, and rich audio effects.
core_goals: Deliver a fully-functional Tetris game playable in web browsers.
Ensure smooth game mechanics including piece movement, rotation, collision detection, locking, and line clearing.
Implement intuitive keyboard controls for game piece manipulation.
Provide state management for UI elements like score, level, and game status.
Render the game board and current pieces efficiently using Canvas.
Integrate background music and sound effects for immersive gameplay experience.
key_features: Robust game engine managing Tetris logic such as piece movement, collision detection, locking, and line clearing.
Real-time game loop to update game state and render frame.
Keyboard input controls supporting movement, rotation, and dropping of tetrominoes.
State management using Zustand to handle game score, level, and status.
Canvas-based game board rendering to visualize game grid and active tetrominoes.
Audio system supporting background music and sound effects playback.
user_flow_summary: User opens the web app and is presented with the Tetris game board.
User uses keyboard controls to move, rotate, and drop tetromino pieces.
The game engine processes user inputs and updates the game board accordingly.
Completed lines are detected and cleared, updating the score and level.
Game state (score, level, status) updates dynamically and are displayed to the user.
Audio system plays background music and sound effects that respond to game events.
Game continues until loss condition is met, then game over state is displayed.
validation_criteria: All core game mechanics such as piece rotation, movement, collision, and line clearing function correctly.
User keyboard inputs are responsive and correctly manipulate the tetromino pieces.
Game state is accurately reflected in the UI for score, level, and game status.
Game board renders correctly on various screen sizes and resolutions.
Audio playback works seamlessly with volume controls and appropriate triggering.
No crashes or severe performance issues during gameplay.
The game runs reliably in supported modern web browsers.
